name: GtProcessInterface
tooltip:
Registers custom processes and calculators.
Allows for the integration of external tools.

functions.name: calculators
description: @brief Returns static meta objects of calculator classes.

functions.name: run
functions.tooltip: Should the process succeed by default?
description: @brief Main run method of the calculator.
@return Whether run process was successful or not.

functions.name: tasks
description: @brief Returns static meta objects of task classes.
